sentences.english: The doctor referred to large numbers of medical records and finally worked out an treatment plan for him.
sentences.chinese: 醫生參閱了大量的醫案，終於給他制定了治療方案。

sentences.english: We study mainly analysis of dates from medical records and put treatments in order.
sentences.chinese: 重在對醫案數據分析及治療方法的分類整理上。

sentences.english: The medical records are the additions to the contents aforementioned.
sentences.chinese: 醫案部分則是對上述內容的進一步補充。

sentences.english: Four proven cases were presented for examples.
sentences.chinese: 在此例舉臨證醫案四則以佐證。

sentences.english: Part three is the statistical analysis to relevant medicine case.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分爲“肝惡抑鬱”相關醫案的統計分析。
